Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content:
@jl777c what API calls are important for a centralised exchange ?
withdraw: z_sendmany
receive: z_getnewaddress
manage coin/funds: z_mergetoaddress

DB operations: keep link of user login and it's associated z address
regular backup, and backup of backups.

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: I guess that's a lot of management stuff ... 😄
